attributes.action: Rename NHS Track and Trace to reflect that is outsourced and not run by the NHS.
attributes.additional_details: This is a Government initiative and it is in their gift alone to make the changes required.
attributes.background: NHS Track and Trace is a Government Funded system that was outsourced to a variety of private companies. The naming of it is misleading, giving the impression that it is run by the NHS. The system should be renamed to reflect its government status or named to identify the company running it.

rejection.details:
NHS Test and Trace is a government programme, under the responsibility of the new National Institute for Health Protection: https://www.gov.uk/government/news/government-creates-new-national-institute-for-health-protection

If you want the Government to remove private companies from the Covid-19 NHS Test and Trace system, you might like to sign the following petition: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/551648
